tool_description: Monitors grid frequency stability by analyzing frequency deviations, rate of change, and stability margins in real-time.

frequency_data.description: Array of frequency measurements in Hz

nominal_frequency.description: System nominal frequency in Hz (50 or 60)

deviation_threshold.description: Frequency deviation alert threshold in Hz (0.01 to 1.0)

rocof_threshold.description: Rate of change of frequency threshold in Hz/s (0.1 to 5.0)

error_messages: Data length mismatch: Frequency data and timestamps arrays must have the same length.
Insufficient data: Minimum 60 frequency measurements required for stability analysis.
Invalid nominal frequency: Must be either 50 or 60 Hz.
Threshold out of range: deviation_threshold must be 0.01-1.0, rocof_threshold must be 0.1-5.0 Hz/s.
Invalid timestamp format: All timestamps must be in ISO 8601 format.
usage: Provide frequency_data array with corresponding timestamps and nominal_frequency. Optionally adjust deviation_threshold and rocof_threshold. Returns stability metrics and alerts.

frequency_deviation.description: Maximum frequency deviation from nominal in Hz

rocof_max.description: Maximum rate of change of frequency in Hz/s

stability_status.description: Overall stability status: stable, marginal, unstable
